data.about:
Periodic Table - This is a free application with a long-form periodic table approved by the International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC).

Application Features: 
    ~  Provides information about any element on the periodic table (including images).
    ~  Search function for elements (Case-Sensitive)
    ~  Elements can be filtered into ten categories:
        1)  Alkaline earth metals
        2)  Alkali metals
        3)  Transition metals
        4)  Post-transition metals
        5)  Lanthanoids
        6)  Metalloids
        7)  Actinoids
        8)  Non metals
        9)  Halogens
        10)  Noble gases
